[{"id":"28","id_user":"1","id_parent":"0","tenbaiviet_vi":"SHERATON RESORT","tenbaiviet_en":"SHERATON RESORT","tenbaiviet_cn":null,"tenbaiviet_jp":null,"mota_vi":"","mota_en":"","mota_cn":null,"mota_jp":null,"noidung_vi":"<div style=\"margin: 0px 0px 17px; text-align: justify;\"><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"color:#2c2f34\"><span style=\"background-color:#ffffff\">Khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng Sheraton Grand Danang Resort t\u1ecda l\u1ea1c tr&ecirc;n b&atilde;i bi\u1ec3n Non N\u01b0\u1edbc c&aacute;t tr\u1eafng xinh \u0111\u1eb9p, l&agrave; khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng \u0111\u1ea7u ti&ecirc;n \u1edf khu v\u1ef1c \u0110&ocirc;ng Nam &Aacute; \u0111\u1ea1t chu\u1ea9n th\u01b0\u01a1ng hi\u1ec7u Sheraton Grand, gia nh\u1eadp b\u1ed9 s\u01b0u t\u1eadp Sheraton Grand cao c\u1ea5p g\u1ed3m 37 kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n v&agrave; khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng kh&aacute;c tr&ecirc;n to&agrave;n th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/div>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:0px 0px 17px; text-align:justify\"><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"color:#2c2f34\"><span style=\"background-color:#ffffff\">T\u1ecda v\u1ecb \u1edf nh\u1eefng \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m du l\u1ecbch thu h&uacute;t nh\u1ea5t th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi, c&aacute;c kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n Sheraton Grand kh\u1eb3ng \u0111\u1ecbnh \u0111\u1eb3ng c\u1ea5p qua nh\u1eefng tr\u01b0\u1eddng ph&aacute;i ki\u1ebfn tr&uacute;c sang tr\u1ecdng, c&aacute;c nh&agrave; h&agrave;ng \u1ea9m th\u1ef1c \u0111\u1ed9c \u0111&aacute;o v&agrave; d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 cao c\u1ea5p, mang \u0111\u1ebfn cho du kh&aacute;ch nh\u1eefng tr\u1ea3i nghi\u1ec7m th\u01b0\u1ee3ng h\u1ea1ng.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align:center\">\r\n<figure class=\"image\" style=\"display:inline-block\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"400\" src=\"https:\/\/danangfantasticity.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2019\/12\/Pool-Sheraton-grand-danang-resort-35-truong-sa-ngu-hanh-son-danang-fantasticity-com.jpg\" width=\"600\" \/>\r\n<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div class=\"gallery galleryid-53194 gallery-columns-2 gallery-size-full\" id=\"gallery-1\" style=\"text-align:center; margin:-5px -5px 15px\">\r\n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">S\u1edf h\u1eefu v\u1ecb tr&iacute; \u0111\u1eafc \u0111\u1ecba n\u1eb1m tr&ecirc;n b&atilde;i bi\u1ec3n Non N\u01b0\u1edbc, khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng Sheraton Grand \u0110&agrave; N\u1eb5ng c&oacute; \u0111\u1ebfn 258 ph&ograve;ng v&agrave; suites nh&igrave;n ra khung c\u1ea3nh h\u1ed3 b\u01a1i v&ocirc; c\u1ef1c, b&aacute;n \u0111\u1ea3o S\u01a1n Tr&agrave; hay bi\u1ec3n xanh l\u1ea5p l&aacute;nh s&oacute;ng v\u1ed7. C&agrave;ng kh&ocirc;ng th\u1ec3 kh&ocirc;ng nh\u1eafc \u0111\u1ebfn s&aacute;u nh&agrave; h&agrave;ng v&agrave; qu\u1ea7y bar mang \u0111\u1ebfn s\u1ef1 phong ph&uacute; v\u1ec1 l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn \u1ea9m th\u1ef1c qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf l\u1eabn \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng v&agrave; \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 ti\u1ec7n nghi hay h\u1ed3 b\u01a1i v&ocirc; c\u1ef1c 250m.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">Ch\u1ec9 c&aacute;ch s&acirc;n bay qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf \u0110&agrave; N\u1eb5ng 20 ph&uacute;t \u0111i xe, Sheraton Grand Danang Resort kh&ocirc;ng ch\u1ec9 n\u1eb1m ngay g\u1ea7n b\u1edd bi\u1ec3n l\u1eebng danh c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 c&aacute;c \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m du l\u1ecbch v&agrave; v\u0103n h&oacute;a n\u1ed1i ti\u1ebfng kh&aacute;c c\u1ee7a th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1 \u0110&agrave; N\u1eb5ng, m&agrave; c&ograve;n n\u1eb1m g\u1ea7n nh\u1eefng Di s\u1ea3n V\u0103n h&oacute;a Th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c UNESCO c&ocirc;ng nh\u1eadn nh\u01b0 Ph\u1ed1 c\u1ed5 H\u1ed9i An hay C\u1ed1 \u0111&ocirc; Hu\u1ebf. Khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng b&ecirc;n b\u1edd b&atilde;i bi\u1ec3n Non N\u01b0\u1edbc bao g\u1ed3m hai khu kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n cao 6 t\u1ea7ng: khu I g\u1ed3m 130 ph&ograve;ng ngh\u1ec9 v&agrave; ph&ograve;ng suite, bao g\u1ed3m c\u0103n ph&ograve;ng T\u1ed5ng Th\u1ed1ng sang tr\u1ecdng, trang nh&atilde;; v&agrave; khu II bao g\u1ed3m 128 ph&ograve;ng ngh\u1ec9 v&agrave; ph&ograve;ng suite, v\u1edbi ph&ograve;ng T\u1ed5ng Th\u1ed1ng \u0111\u1eb3ng c\u1ea5p c&oacute; l\u1ed1i \u0111i VIP, thang m&aacute;y ri&ecirc;ng v&agrave; b&atilde;i \u0111&aacute;p\/ c\u1ea5t c&aacute;nh m&aacute;y bay tr\u1ef1c th\u0103ng.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align:center\">\r\n<figure class=\"image\" style=\"display:inline-block\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"400\" src=\"https:\/\/danangfantasticity.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2019\/12\/Deluxe-king-bedroom-seaview-Sheraton-grand-danang-resort-35-truong-sa-ngu-hanh-son-danang-fantasticity-com.jpg\" width=\"600\" \/>\r\n<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">&nbsp;<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\"><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 ph&ograve;ng ngh\u1ec9 \u0111\u1ec1u c&oacute; ban c&ocirc;ng ri&ecirc;ng, \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c trang tr&iacute; theo phong c&aacute;ch c\u1ed5 \u0111i\u1ec3n qu&yacute; ph&aacute;i pha l\u1eabn v\u1edbi v&agrave;i \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng n&eacute;t \u0111\u01b0\u01a1ng \u0111\u1ea1i, t\u1ea1o ra m\u1ed9t kh&ocirc;ng gian trang tr\u1ecdng \u1ea5m c&uacute;ng, v&agrave; \u0111\u1ed9c \u0111&aacute;o. C&aacute;c ph&ograve;ng ng\u1ee7 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf h\u01b0\u1edbng v\u1ec1 ph&iacute;a v\u1ecbnh bi\u1ec3n, t\u1ea1o c\u1ea3m gi&aacute;c g\u1ea7n g\u0169i v\u1edbi thi&ecirc;n nhi&ecirc;n, nh\u1eb1m \u0111em l\u1ea1i khung c\u1ea3nh \u0111\u1eb9p nh\u1ea5t. N\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c b&agrave;y bi\u1ec7n t\u1ec9 m\u1ec9, mang \u0111\u1eadm tr\u01b0\u1eddng ph&aacute;i sang tr\u1ecdng, c&ugrave;ng nh\u1eefng n&eacute;t ch\u1ea5m ph&aacute; n\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t sinh \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u1ee7a nhi\u1ec1u m&agrave;u s\u1eafc v&agrave; khung c\u1ea3nh qua khung c\u1eeda r\u1ed9ng, l&agrave;m n\u1ed5i b\u1eadt s\u1ef1 sinh \u0111\u1ed9ng v&agrave; \u0111\u1eb9p \u0111\u1ebd c\u1ee7a thi&ecirc;n nhi&ecirc;n bao quanh khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng.<\/span><\/span><\/div>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">&nbsp;<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\r\n<div style=\"text-align:center\">\r\n<figure class=\"image\" style=\"display:inline-block\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"400\" src=\"https:\/\/danangfantasticity.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2019\/12\/khu-nghi-duong-sheraton-grand-da-nang-chao-don-quy-khach-den-voi-nhung-ki-nghi-mua-le-hoi-tran-ngap-niem-vui-03.jpg\" width=\"600\" \/>\r\n<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">&nbsp;<\/div>\r\n<\/div>","noidung_en":"<div style=\"margin: 0px 0px 17px; text-align: justify;\"><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"color:#2c2f34\"><span style=\"background-color:#ffffff\">Khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng Sheraton Grand Danang Resort t\u1ecda l\u1ea1c tr&ecirc;n b&atilde;i bi\u1ec3n Non N\u01b0\u1edbc c&aacute;t tr\u1eafng xinh \u0111\u1eb9p, l&agrave; khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng \u0111\u1ea7u ti&ecirc;n \u1edf khu v\u1ef1c \u0110&ocirc;ng Nam &Aacute; \u0111\u1ea1t chu\u1ea9n th\u01b0\u01a1ng hi\u1ec7u Sheraton Grand, gia nh\u1eadp b\u1ed9 s\u01b0u t\u1eadp Sheraton Grand cao c\u1ea5p g\u1ed3m 37 kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n v&agrave; khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng kh&aacute;c tr&ecirc;n to&agrave;n th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/div>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:0px 0px 17px; text-align:justify\"><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"color:#2c2f34\"><span style=\"background-color:#ffffff\">T\u1ecda v\u1ecb \u1edf nh\u1eefng \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m du l\u1ecbch thu h&uacute;t nh\u1ea5t th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi, c&aacute;c kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n Sheraton Grand kh\u1eb3ng \u0111\u1ecbnh \u0111\u1eb3ng c\u1ea5p qua nh\u1eefng tr\u01b0\u1eddng ph&aacute;i ki\u1ebfn tr&uacute;c sang tr\u1ecdng, c&aacute;c nh&agrave; h&agrave;ng \u1ea9m th\u1ef1c \u0111\u1ed9c \u0111&aacute;o v&agrave; d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 cao c\u1ea5p, mang \u0111\u1ebfn cho du kh&aacute;ch nh\u1eefng tr\u1ea3i nghi\u1ec7m th\u01b0\u1ee3ng h\u1ea1ng.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align:center\">\r\n<figure class=\"image\" style=\"display:inline-block\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"400\" src=\"https:\/\/danangfantasticity.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2019\/12\/Pool-Sheraton-grand-danang-resort-35-truong-sa-ngu-hanh-son-danang-fantasticity-com.jpg\" width=\"600\" \/>\r\n<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div class=\"gallery galleryid-53194 gallery-columns-2 gallery-size-full\" id=\"gallery-1\" style=\"text-align:center; margin:-5px -5px 15px\">\r\n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">S\u1edf h\u1eefu v\u1ecb tr&iacute; \u0111\u1eafc \u0111\u1ecba n\u1eb1m tr&ecirc;n b&atilde;i bi\u1ec3n Non N\u01b0\u1edbc, khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng Sheraton Grand \u0110&agrave; N\u1eb5ng c&oacute; \u0111\u1ebfn 258 ph&ograve;ng v&agrave; suites nh&igrave;n ra khung c\u1ea3nh h\u1ed3 b\u01a1i v&ocirc; c\u1ef1c, b&aacute;n \u0111\u1ea3o S\u01a1n Tr&agrave; hay bi\u1ec3n xanh l\u1ea5p l&aacute;nh s&oacute;ng v\u1ed7. C&agrave;ng kh&ocirc;ng th\u1ec3 kh&ocirc;ng nh\u1eafc \u0111\u1ebfn s&aacute;u nh&agrave; h&agrave;ng v&agrave; qu\u1ea7y bar mang \u0111\u1ebfn s\u1ef1 phong ph&uacute; v\u1ec1 l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn \u1ea9m th\u1ef1c qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf l\u1eabn \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng v&agrave; \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 ti\u1ec7n nghi hay h\u1ed3 b\u01a1i v&ocirc; c\u1ef1c 250m.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">Ch\u1ec9 c&aacute;ch s&acirc;n bay qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf \u0110&agrave; N\u1eb5ng 20 ph&uacute;t \u0111i xe, Sheraton Grand Danang Resort kh&ocirc;ng ch\u1ec9 n\u1eb1m ngay g\u1ea7n b\u1edd bi\u1ec3n l\u1eebng danh c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 c&aacute;c \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m du l\u1ecbch v&agrave; v\u0103n h&oacute;a n\u1ed1i ti\u1ebfng kh&aacute;c c\u1ee7a th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1 \u0110&agrave; N\u1eb5ng, m&agrave; c&ograve;n n\u1eb1m g\u1ea7n nh\u1eefng Di s\u1ea3n V\u0103n h&oacute;a Th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c UNESCO c&ocirc;ng nh\u1eadn nh\u01b0 Ph\u1ed1 c\u1ed5 H\u1ed9i An hay C\u1ed1 \u0111&ocirc; Hu\u1ebf. Khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng b&ecirc;n b\u1edd b&atilde;i bi\u1ec3n Non N\u01b0\u1edbc bao g\u1ed3m hai khu kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n cao 6 t\u1ea7ng: khu I g\u1ed3m 130 ph&ograve;ng ngh\u1ec9 v&agrave; ph&ograve;ng suite, bao g\u1ed3m c\u0103n ph&ograve;ng T\u1ed5ng Th\u1ed1ng sang tr\u1ecdng, trang nh&atilde;; v&agrave; khu II bao g\u1ed3m 128 ph&ograve;ng ngh\u1ec9 v&agrave; ph&ograve;ng suite, v\u1edbi ph&ograve;ng T\u1ed5ng Th\u1ed1ng \u0111\u1eb3ng c\u1ea5p c&oacute; l\u1ed1i \u0111i VIP, thang m&aacute;y ri&ecirc;ng v&agrave; b&atilde;i \u0111&aacute;p\/ c\u1ea5t c&aacute;nh m&aacute;y bay tr\u1ef1c th\u0103ng.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align:center\">\r\n<figure class=\"image\" style=\"display:inline-block\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"400\" src=\"https:\/\/danangfantasticity.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2019\/12\/Deluxe-king-bedroom-seaview-Sheraton-grand-danang-resort-35-truong-sa-ngu-hanh-son-danang-fantasticity-com.jpg\" width=\"600\" \/>\r\n<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">&nbsp;<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\"><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 ph&ograve;ng ngh\u1ec9 \u0111\u1ec1u c&oacute; ban c&ocirc;ng ri&ecirc;ng, \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c trang tr&iacute; theo phong c&aacute;ch c\u1ed5 \u0111i\u1ec3n qu&yacute; ph&aacute;i pha l\u1eabn v\u1edbi v&agrave;i \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng n&eacute;t \u0111\u01b0\u01a1ng \u0111\u1ea1i, t\u1ea1o ra m\u1ed9t kh&ocirc;ng gian trang tr\u1ecdng \u1ea5m c&uacute;ng, v&agrave; \u0111\u1ed9c \u0111&aacute;o. C&aacute;c ph&ograve;ng ng\u1ee7 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf h\u01b0\u1edbng v\u1ec1 ph&iacute;a v\u1ecbnh bi\u1ec3n, t\u1ea1o c\u1ea3m gi&aacute;c g\u1ea7n g\u0169i v\u1edbi thi&ecirc;n nhi&ecirc;n, nh\u1eb1m \u0111em l\u1ea1i khung c\u1ea3nh \u0111\u1eb9p nh\u1ea5t. N\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c b&agrave;y bi\u1ec7n t\u1ec9 m\u1ec9, mang \u0111\u1eadm tr\u01b0\u1eddng ph&aacute;i sang tr\u1ecdng, c&ugrave;ng nh\u1eefng n&eacute;t ch\u1ea5m ph&aacute; n\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t sinh \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u1ee7a nhi\u1ec1u m&agrave;u s\u1eafc v&agrave; khung c\u1ea3nh qua khung c\u1eeda r\u1ed9ng, l&agrave;m n\u1ed5i b\u1eadt s\u1ef1 sinh \u0111\u1ed9ng v&agrave; \u0111\u1eb9p \u0111\u1ebd c\u1ee7a thi&ecirc;n nhi&ecirc;n bao quanh khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng.<\/span><\/span><\/div>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">&nbsp;<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div
